description:
After plunging Hibiki into the depths of despair, Choreo has stolen the throne of Danceworld and begun unleashing havoc upon the universe. Can the power of dance bring Flash Beat back? And what is the secret behind Maito`s terrible resentment?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Stand Up, Hibiki! The Decisive Battle in Danceworld!
立ち上がれ響! 決戦ダンスワールド!!
